decision_conditions:
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none">The habitable space shall be used
for purposes incidental and ancillary to the enjoyment of the main
dwellinghouse. The proposed habitable space shall not be used as a separate dwelling
or residential unit. <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none">&nbsp;</p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none"><br></p>
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

<p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><p><span style="line-height: 115%;">Site Location Plan; 397:RES; 397:02; 397:03; 397:04;
397:05; 397:06; 397:11; 397:12; 397:13; 397:14; 397:15; 397:16; 397:17.</span></p>
The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

The window(s) in the flank elevation(s) of the proposed development shall:
(a) be of purpose-made obscure glass,
(b) be permanently fixed closed below a height of 1.7m above finished floor level,
and shall thereafter be retained in that form.
description: Conversion of garage and under croft to habitable room, First floor side extension, External alterations
